0110010010110101 0001001110010111 1 -> sum: 0111100001001101, cout: 0
1010110001001111 1100001101011101 1 -> sum: 0110111110101101, cout: 1

0000101000000100 1010111011111100 0 -> sum: 1011100100000000, cout: 0
0010010101101110 0011101100111111 1 -> sum: 0110000010101110, cout: 0
1010100010101110 1001100100000100 0 -> sum: 0100000110110010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
